name: Mindstone
overview: An early role-playing game originally designed and coded by John Pitcher and published by The Edge in 1986 for the ZX Spectrum. Later converted by Pennsoft in 1987 for the Amstrad CPC and published by The Edge in the same year. A compilation including this game called "All-Stars" was published in 1988 by The Edge for both systems, Amstrad CPC and ZX Spectrum.
